author: garvit_electron
content:
Hi,

I want to make a pitch for inclusion in the light client summit presentations - 

This is Garvit from Electron. We are building a ZK-prover for full ethereum consensus. For many use cases, folks are relying on the Altair Light Client, which inherits limited Ethereum security. This is because the full Ethereum consensus node is computationally expensive to run. Hence, we want to "zk-compress" this, such that it can become cheap to verify full ethereum consensus.
